advent.name: Advent
advent.description: Arctic-themed events that may change the area's future

cards.cue: TWO EXPLORERS ARE RACING TO BE THE FIRST TO REACH A REMOTE AREA:
interpretations: OR TOP OF A PEAK, BOTTOM OF A CAVE, OR END OF A FROZEN WATERWAY

cards.cue: PEOPLE ARE SETTLING IN FOR A HUNGRY WINTER:
interpretations: DUE TO OVERHUNTING, A LEAN HARVEST, OR A MINI ICE AGE

cards.cue: ALL MAIL AND DELIVERIES IN AND OUT HAVE STOPPED:
interpretations: DUE TO IMPASSABLE TERRAIN, AN EMBARGO, OR A TERRIBLE INCIDENT

cards.cue: SOMETHING FROZEN IN ICE LONG AGO HAS BEGUN TO THAW:
THE MAGNETIC POLE IS SHIFTING UNEXPECTEDLY:
interpretations: IT IS SLOW-JARRING, SETTLING INTO MULTIPLE POINTS, OR MOVING WITH PURPOSE

cards.cue: THE SKY'S AURORA EFFECT IS BEGINNING TO BEHAVE IN A STRANGE WAY:
interpretations: CHANGING BRIGHTNESS, DISTURBING PATTERNS, OR HYPNOTIC PATTERNS

cards.cue: A HUGE AVALANCHE HAS BURIED THE AREA:
interpretations: RESULTING IN WILDLIFE MIGRATION, TRAPPED SURVIVORS, OR ROUTE CLOSURES

cards.cue: CAIRNS ARE POPPING UP WITHOUT EXPLANATION:
interpretations: SUSPECTED TO WARD THE AREA, CURSE THE AREA, OR MARK A PATH

cards.cue: RECENT SNOWFALL HAS LED TO AN IMPROMPTU COMPETITION:
interpretations: OF SNOW SCULPTING, SNOWBALL FIGHTING, OR SLEDDING

cards.cue: A MASSIVE BLIZZARD IS BEGINNING STRENGTH:
interpretations: IF IT WET MED IN AND BRING CONTROLLED, OR BRUISES LIKE IT IS ALIVE

cards.cue: HIGH WINDS HAVE EXPOSED SOMETHING LONG BURIED IN THE SNOW:
interpretations: A HOSTILE, ARTIFACT, OR LOST EXPEDITION

cards.cue: THE WINTER FOOD SUPPLY HAS STARTED SPOILING:
interpretations: DUE TO FUNGUS, INSECTS, OR SABOTAGE

cards.cue: THE SEASONAL THAW IS CAUSING A MAJOR PROBLEM:
interpretations: A FLOOD, FEEDING FRENZY, OR SECRET UNCOVERED BY RECEDING SNOW

cards.cue: SOMEONE IS LOOKING FOR VOLUNTEERS TO TEST A NEW SLEDDING INVENTION:
interpretations: POWERED BY ENGINE, WIND, OR PEDALS

usage.description: A 60-card arctic expansion with biome-focused cards for creating frozen and polar worlds. Contains both brand-new cues and themed variants of standard cards.
integration: Create a monoclimate setting - Use only this expansion to create a world of up to 8 microsettings with a single climate focus
Develop specific biomes in a larger world - Use the main deck to create your world and switch to the expansion to develop arctic areas
Mix expansion cards into the main deck - Although some cues may be harder to interpret outside the specific biome, they are largely cross-compatible
Mix cards and use a sideboard - Draw from a set of faceup cards for less random and more intentional worldbuilding
